title: Ivor the Engine and the Elephants
brief_description: Life with the Merioneth and Llantisilly Rail Traction Company Limited is never quite ordinary. Ivor is a very ordinary engine of course … ordinary for Wales that is. He sings in the choir … but what is he to do when there is an elephant on the line? An elephant with a bad foot to boot! And where do you find an elephant’s boot in Wales? Rated: G
